issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: By-product of MR-3214. Disable tests for the short term until fixes are available for all tests.
fields.summary: Disable some failing legacy tests for MRv2 builds to go through

comments.body: I just committed this. Thanks Hitesh!

Integrated in Hadoop-Hdfs-0.23-Commit #119 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-Hdfs-0.23-Commit/119/])
    Merge -c 1195743 from trunk to branch-0.23 to fix MAPREDUCE-3321.
